name: The Legendary Tale of Eddie the Brave
name_original: The Legendary Tale of Eddie the Brave
description:
Embark on a tale of Eddie the Brave as he joins with allies to save his corrupted friend, the balding man.

Darkest Dungeon Inspired Popsicle Theater RPG

Recommended 1920x1080 Resolution

Game ends after credits roll, just Alt+F4

Submitted for moonmoon_ow Game Jam May 2019

Team: The Pit moon2H

Members: TuSani, Quieto, perfect_redemption, garomulus

(we are still updating this game casually)
